## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand, account for potential variability, and maintain healthy stock levels. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 8,000 units less than the player's planned order. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 4 days                                     |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5+ days                                   |
| Comments                          | Ordering in multiples of 20,000 units provides the optimal balance between covering demand and minimizing excess inventory. |
